name: Breakneck Brewing
description:
SUBMISSION TO THE WANNA YAM JAM 2022

Make sure to play in full screen for the best experience. 

In this fast-paced potion brewing simulator, you'll need to follow recipes and decrypt instructions using an Alchemist's Cipher. Be quick and careful not to let your plants and animals starve. Meet the potion quota for each level before the time expires to win.

Programmer and game designer -- Pinhead71 (myself)

Art, music, and game design -- Sewerlamb -- https://sewerlamb.itch.io/

This is the first jam either of us have participated in, and we greatly enjoyed the development process. We hope that you enjoy playing! Post some screenshots if you get any particularly impressive times on the levels. 

Playing levels in order is recommended, but not required. 

Extra controls:

- The "Next Level" button was not implemented properly and only restarts the current level. Press "Quit" then the desired level in the menu to continue

- Move left and right with A and D

- ESC or P to pause

- Click the inventory button to drop your item (you can drop potions as well to reset the cauldron). 

(If you're finding the cipher a little hard to understand, the bottom icon is the icon you'll find in the recipe book and the top icon is the translation of the ingredient)
